倒不這麼看，老人可能經歷過切身鐵拳，最知道共產黨的邪惡，只是沒力氣發聲而已反而一些年輕的常年在牆內看...


Some of the older generation actually spent their formative years in the 1980s, arguably the most open and liberal period of Mainland China. I worry about the younger generations instead, especially those who have never experienced life without GFW.
